dmca.title: The Doctor's Test Questions
dmca.body:
April 29, 2011

Attn: Webmasters – http://www.cpplc.net

To Whom It May Concern:
The following pages on your website contain copyrighted material:
http://www.cpplc.net/forum/index.php?action=printpage;topic=1042.0
-	Item 4 on your site is copyrighted material.












This material consists of test questions developed by Brainbench Inc. (a wholly owned subsidiary of SHL PreVisor Inc.).
I would request that this material be removed immediately, as it contains test questions that are currently being used by our clients to evaluate and certify job applicants and existing employees.

Please feel free to contact me at sgutierrez@previsor.com or by phone (315-638-1905).  
In addition, my mailing address is:
Sara L. Gutierrez, Research Scientist
PreVisor Inc.
14425 Penrose Place, Suite 150
Chantilly, VA  20151

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

__________________________________________
Sara L. Gutierrez, PhD
Research Scientist
PreVisor Inc.
